page.title: 08BRAILES ANNUAL VILLAGE FETES
page.content: There are two notable events in Brailes. The first is St. George's Church Fete, held on the Village Playing Field in June. Gaily decked stalls, competions, games and children's sports are the main attractions. Visiting entertainers usually provide a special feature and afternoon teas are served in the Village Hall. In August the second and much larger event _ The Brailes Show _ takes place. The day begins with a Horse Show and Gymkhana. The Flower Show Marquee opens in the afternoon, together with various stalls, side_ shows, competitions, a dog show and football to entertain the large crowds. The Show attracts many visitors and competitors from a wide area.
